title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads Class 143 private Expert Line
description:
The package includes the Lok BR143 in four different finishes, 
as they are in private railways on German routes in use.

The vehicles have a very high level of realism in 
the use and therefore a very high demand on the driver!


RailWorks 3 features (raindrops, light cone)
Prototypical handling during acceleration and braking
replicated thyristor stage controller with direct control option
Overload protection in power intrusion and wheel slip
acoustic wheel slip, and slip-warning
Cruise control ("AFB" function)
3 special programs for cruise control
ZWS and ZDS modes for "real" push-pull trains / double header
SIFA and PZB90 (PZB90 only in conjunction with the Mitgel. INDUSI magnet)
TAV door control (manual closing) for equipped cars
"Random" disorders such TrennschÃƒÂ¼tz-, and AFB failure to bailing sand container
manually separately controllable pantograph
Notification window / vR Message System
continuous beam control and two-stage driver's cab light
realistic sound (optimized for EAX sound cards)
separately adapted AI Sound
Option files for AI and player
 

BR143 RHB
BR143 Ekotrans
BR143 Ekotrans / square buffer
BR143 Alcelor Mittal
BR143 Alcelor Mittal / square buffer
BR143 MEG
